Player History
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1982, hitting .417 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1983, hitting .433 with 4 HR, 13 RBI...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Traded from Plum Grove to Halifax on 5/13/1985 (Going to PG: P S. Hanchett, P H. Shope, P O. Cuevas. Going to HAL: RF E. Gatson)...
Had 2000th career hit on 7/7/1985, off Kevin Crandell (SYR)...
Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 2/3/1986 to a 3-year deal worth $5,095,800 per year...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1986, hitting .565 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Had 26-game hitting streak snapped on 8/30/1986...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1986, hitting .429 with 8 HR, 28 RBI...
Had 25-game hitting streak snapped on 10/3/1986...
